Name: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle
Text: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to any target.\n{T}: Add {R}.

Name: Emeria Angel
Text: Flying\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

Name: Nissa's Chosen
Text: If Nissa's Chosen would die, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

Name: Rampaging Baloths
